commit message: Changed target API to level 8 and allow to move app to SD (on Froyo)

* Updated icon
* Added ldpi and hdpi icon versions
Updated splash screen to new logo

* Implemented SharedPreferences support (to store sort order)
* Added functionality to sort items by name
* Increased update interval from 5 minutes to 10 minutes

* List now also shows distance when sorted alphabetically (but not when no
information is available)
Set User-Agent string for HTTP requests
Make sure location updates are disabled properly
